item.title: What if......? #adedu
item.description:
What if......? #adedu

I have been thinking about this post for some time now.  Reading other peoples frustrations with education and also seeing the amazing things that educators are trying to do makes m think that there is something really wrong with education in the UK.

item.title: First month in Teacher Training
item.description:
First month in Teacher Training

So I am nearly 1 month into my new job in Higher Education working with BEd students in Teacher Training and it's safe to say it has been a real whirlwind, but I am enjoying every minute of it.
